alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 11:10AM CST until January 01 at 11:45AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1145 AM CST. * At 1110 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Clarksville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Adams and Woodlawn. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 1 and 9. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
